title: Page 12BSunday June 15, 2014 \'News & Notes\' had a photograph of three Cadets. All three, and especially the one on the right, had a huge number of ribbons and medals that would make a Three Star General cry. What did a Cadet do to earn so many?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/how-do-jrotc-cadets-earn-medals/
